title: Cyberpunk 2077 Multiplayer Game Cancelled?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.31.21
description:
Go to http://expressvpn.com/games to get an extra 3 months free!

Blessing and Tim talk about Cyberpunk's multiplayer game seemingly being cancelled, Xbox Backwards compatible games coming to the Cloud, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:30 - Housekeeping
A new Gamescast is live and it’s our Monster Hunter: Rise Review featuring the return of Imran The Don Kahn. You can catch that on the Gamescast feed and on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
Today, after KFGD: Greg’s Outriders stream is raising money for the American Heart Association! Tune in for the normal Wednesday stream but this time for a good cause! Donate now at kindafunny.com/aha!
Next Monday Andy, Mike, and Greg Miller himself will be streaming Outriders showing off Nvidia’s super cool DLSS tech starting at 11AM PT on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:05:12 - CD Projekt has seemingly cancelled the Cyberpunk multiplayer game - Tom Ivan @ Video Games Chronicle
00:17:18 -  Mario is DEAD
00:22:00 -  Xbox Backward Compatibility is coming to the Cloud - news.xbox.com
00:27:38 - 505 Games buys the Ghostrunner IP for €5m - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
00:30:52 -  Ad  
00:37:40 - No Man's Sky is getting a big new update that Adds Big Shared Journeys - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:38:30 - Can we name another company with such dedication to their game and their fanbase? - Best Friends Q:Peter Davis
00:43:22 - Genshin Impact Coming to PS5 'Soon' With Enhancements - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:45:00 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:49:20 -  - D-Reux87 
00:56:55 - Required Reading: Meet The Developers Who Are About To Lose Their PS Vita Games Forever - Kirk Mckeand @ The Gamer
00:59:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Andy & Nick (for the highly anticipated April Fool’s episode)

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
